title: Physical Therapy Diversity Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support to promote diversity within Physical Therapy at the Anschutz Medical Campus. Includes students from under-served groups, 1st generation, and students from low income families.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support to promote diversity within Physical Therapy at the Anschutz Medical Campus. This may include students from under-served groups, 1st generation college students, and those from low income families.
